trans-unit.source: Interacts with the parser to build an <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 与分析器进行交互以生成 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> 控件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelectBuilder> control interacts with the page parser to build an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelectBuilder>控件页分析器，以生成与交互<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>控件。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelectBuilder> control to customize the parsing of an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelectBuilder>控件可自定义的分析<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>控件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelectBuilder.AllowWhitespaceLiterals%2A> property is set to `false` so that white space is always ignored.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelectBuilder.AllowWhitespaceLiterals%2A>属性设置为`false`，以便始终忽略空白区域。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelectBuilder.GetChildControlType%2A> method to determine the type of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control's child controls.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelectBuilder.GetChildControlType%2A>方法来确定的一种<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>控件的子控件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to create a custom <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelectBuilder> control that defines two types of `<option>` child elements of a custom <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control and then processes each type differently.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何创建自定义<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelectBuilder>定义两种类型的控件`<option>`的自定义的子元素<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>控件，然后处理每种类型以不同的方式。

trans-unit.source: To create a custom control builder for an <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> control, you need to inherit from this class.
trans-unit.target: 若要创建的自定义控件生成器<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" />控件，你需要从该类继承。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelectBuilder" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelectBuilder" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is used by ASP.NET when parsing the page and creating the control hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 分析页面时，使用此构造函数由 ASP.NET 和创建的控件层次结构。

trans-unit.source: It is not intended for use in your code.
trans-unit.target: 它不用于在代码中使用。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the white space literals in an <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> control are to be processed or ignored.
trans-unit.target: 确定是处理还是忽略 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> 控件中的空白。

trans-unit.source: This method always returns <see langword="false" />, indicating that white space in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> control is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 此方法总是返回 <see langword="false" />，指示忽略 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> 控件中的空白。

trans-unit.source: This method overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder.AllowWhitespaceLiterals%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to always ignore white space in the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将替代<xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder.AllowWhitespaceLiterals%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法始终忽略中的白色空间<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>控件。

trans-unit.source: The tag name of the child control.
trans-unit.target: 子控件的标记名称。

trans-unit.source: An array of attributes contained in the child control.
trans-unit.target: 包含在子控件中的属性的数组。

trans-unit.source: Obtains the <see cref="T:System.Type" /> for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> control's child controls.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> 控件的子控件的 <see cref="T:System.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> control's specified child control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 控件的指定子控件的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelectBuilder.GetChildControlType%2A> method to return the <xref:System.Type> of a specified child control in an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelectBuilder.GetChildControlType%2A>方法以返回<xref:System.Type>中指定的子控件<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>控件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to override the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelectBuilder.GetChildControlType%2A> method to check for custom child control types.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何重写<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelectBuilder.GetChildControlType%2A>方法来检查自定义的子控件的类型。

trans-unit.source: For a complete, working code example, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelectBuilder> class overview topic.
trans-unit.target: 有关完整的工作代码示例，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelectBuilder>类概述主题。
